span.strong: Mastering Odoo: A Guide to Streamlining Your Carpentry Business

template.p: Welcome, carpenters! This guide will help you elevate your custom table business using Odoo, a platform that br/ings together sales, stock, purchases, and customer contacts in one place. Let's dive into Odoo's features and see how to get the most out of each tool step-by-step.

With Odoo, you can streamline operations like Sales Management, Stock Management, and Purchase Management to save time and improve customer satisfaction. This integrated approach helps you focus more on crafting your products and providing exceptional service.
template.h2: Setting Up Odoo for Carpentry Business
template.p: Hereâ€™s a br/eakdown of how to set up and use Odoo to organize and manage your carpentry business effectively:
Begin with the Sales Management app to organize and track your sales orders.

ul.li: Click on the Sales app on the dashboard.
Select Create to open a new sale order form.
Enter customer details and add product specifics, including quantity and price.
You can chose a quotation template. This will load a Quote Calculator.
In this you have a template, where you can set the area of your framework (b9).
Filling this will automatically adjust the quantity.
You can also set the margin as you wish!
Click on Save and the quotation is automatically changed.
After filling in all necessary details, select Save to store the sale order.

template.p: Efficient inventory management is crucial for tracking materials and finished products. Hereâ€™s how to manage your stock:

ul.li: Access the Inventory app.
Click on Products to view current stock levels.
Adjust quantities as needed by selecting a product and editing stock levels.
Routinely check inventory to ensure you're prepared to meet customer demand.

template.p: Odoo's Purchases app allows you to manage material orders efficiently.

ul.li: Navigate to the Purchases app.
Click Create to open a new purchase order.
Select your supplier, specify materials needed, and complete the order form.
Finalize by clicking Confirm to process the purchase order.

template.p: Keeping an organized contact list helps maintain customer relationships and supplier connections.

ul.li: Go to the Contacts app.
Click Create to add a new contact with relevant details.
Link contacts to their respective sales orders for easy reference.
From this view you can also add a report. This lets you chose whether you want a simplified invoice or a complete one per customer.

template.p: Optimize your Odoo experience with these additional features:

ul.li: Custom Products: Add your custom tables as products in Odoo for smoother order processing.
Email Templates: Use templates to enhance customer communication, such as welcoming new clients or thanking them after purchase.
Analytics: Review sales analytics regularly to determine popular products and focus on what sells best.

template.h1: Project and Task Automation for Carpentry Services
template.p: Odoo can automate project and task creation for service-oriented products, which is useful for managing time-based tasks like custom carpentry work. Hereâ€™s an overview of what Odoo can automate:
For products like custom tables or wood frames, Odoo can automatically create a new project based on a pre-defined template upon sale. Key benefits include:

ul.li: Automatic project creation for new orders.
Consistency in project structure, tasks, and timesheets.
Ability to invoice clients based on completion or milestones.

template.p: For items such as custom desks, tasks can be created within a larger, ongoing project, which allows for:

ul.li: Task creation upon sale within an existing project framework.
Tracking time spent on individual tasks through timesheets for billing accuracy.
Billing upon task or service completion.

template.h3: Advantages of Automated Projects and Tasks

ul.li: Automation: Projects and tasks are created without manual input, improving efficiency.
Standardization: Pre-defined templates ensure consistent project structure.
Time Tracking: Timesheets make it easy to track work hours and bill clients accordingly.

template.p: Odooâ€™s quotation templates simplify complex estimates, especially for projects like roofing where material calculations are needed.
Using a quotation template, you can set up material requirements based on project dimensions. This feature enables you to:

ul.li: Calculate exact quantities of materials like tiles, beams, and insulation based on project dimensions.
Adjust margins on materials directly in the quotation to ensure profitability.

template.p: For a clean, professional look, Odoo allows you to present a summarized quotation:

ul.li: Select Send Simplified Quotation to hide detailed lines and provide an overview for customers.
If you wish to change the portal view too you can select in sales settings the "Simplified Quotations
If using sections, sales order lines will be grouped under each section for better clarity.
Sections without sales order lines will display only the project name.

ul.li: Select Simplified Invoicein report in the contact view to hide detailed lines and provide an overview for customers.

Presentation: Simplified quotation views help communicate effectively with customers.
